title: Magix Vegas Movie Studio Platinum V15.0.0.116 (x64) Multilingual
description:
[color='blue'][b]Description:[/b][/color] 
Video Editing Software for the Advanced Moviemaker VEGAS® Movie Studio Platinum. With VEGAS® Movie Studio Platinum as your creative partner, transform your video clips and digital photos into lasting memories. Easy-to-use pro-level editing tools along with flashy titles and effects provide pure inspiration, not just video editing software.

[color='blue'][b]Features:[/b][/color]

A seriously-creative editing environment
Customize your workflow
Multicam production
You never run out of ideas. You’ll never run out of space.
A creative way to move from scene to scene
Recover shaky video
Enhance your colors
Author a DVD or a High-Definition Blu-ray Disc

[color='blue'][b]System requirements:
[/b][/color]
You need a 64-bit version of one the following operating systems: Microsoft Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
2 GHz processor (multicore or multiprocessor CPU recommended for HD or stereoscopic 3D)
1.5 GB hard-disk space for program installation
4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended; 16 GB recommended for 4K)
USB 2.0 connection (for importing from AVCHD, XDCAM EX, NXCAM, or DVD camcorders)
512 MB GPU memory
Supported NVIDIA, AMD or Intel GPU
Windows-compatible sound card
DVD-ROM drive (for installation from a DVD only)
Supported CD-recordable drive (for CD burning only)
Supported DVD-R/-RW/+R/+RW (for DVD burning only)
Supported BD-R/-RE drive (for Blu-ray Disc burning only)
Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0 SP1 (included on application disc)

[color='blue'][b]Installation:[/b][/color]

1. Extract RAR file.
2. Install Setup file.
3. Don't open Movie Studio.
4. Open Fix Folder Copy All files to C:Program FilesVEGASMovie Studio Platinum 15.0 and replace old file.
5. Done.Enjoy.

[b][color='blue']Screenshoots:
